title: Abandoned Derelict
description: You detect an abandoned derelict drifting in space.
dialogue: Commander, weâ€™ve found a derelict ship.
It appears lifeless, but we might find something valuable inside.

choices.outcome: You find a stash of abandoned supplies but burn extra fuel reaching the derelict.
You decide it's too risky and continue on your journey.

title: Distress Signal
description: Your sensors detect a weak distress signal coming from a nearby asteroid belt.
dialogue: Commander, we're picking up a distress signal.
It's faint, but someone out there might need help.

choices.outcome: You find a stranded pilot. They ride with you until the next space station, boosting morale.
You decide to stay on course, leaving the mystery unsolved.

title: Solar Storm
description: A sudden solar storm erupts in your sector, causing dangerous radiation levels.
dialogue: Commander, radiation levels are rising fast!
We need to act quickly before ship systems take damage.

choices.outcome: The shields hold, but it drains extra fuel.
Radiation overloads some ship systems, causing hull damage.

title: Derelict Warship
description: You stumble upon the wreckage of an old warship, floating in the void.
dialogue: Commander, we've discovered the remains of a warship.
It might still contain valuable salvage, but it could also be dangerous.

choices.outcome: You recover valuable scrap metal and weapons, selling them for credits.
You decide not to take the risk and move on.

title: Pirate Ambush
description: Pirates have been lurking in this sector. Your ship comes under sudden attack!
dialogue: Commander, enemy ships on an intercept course!

choices.outcome: After a tough battle, you defeat the pirates and claim their cargo.
You manage to escape, but at the cost of precious fuel reserves.

title: Alien Transmission
description: A mysterious alien signal is detected. It appears to be an invitation... or a warning.
dialogue: Commander, we're receiving a non-human transmission.
It could be an attempt at communication... or a trap.

choices.outcome: Your scientists crack part of the code, gaining new insights and boosting morale.
You decide to play it safe and continue your journey.
